name: 王鴻祥
objective: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養專業設計之能力。
schedule:
WK 01       Introduction: Future designers & Pre-test
WK 02~08 PROJECT 1: Proof of cencept for a smart design that benefits target users (simple products for sophomore; complex products for junior; integrated systems for senior)
WK 09       Midterm
WK 10~16 PROJECT 2: Proof of cencept for a product-service system using technologies of AI and sustainability (simple products for sophomore; complex products for junior; integrated systems for senior)
WK 17       Reflection & Post-test
WK 18       Submit personal e-protfolio
scorePolicy:
Participation 20%
Project 1 performance 20%
Project 2 performance 20%
e-Portfolio 20%
Bonus 10% (Honors and award winners, limited to the outcomes from Projects 1 & 2)

name: 郭若妤
objective:
以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容，以培養專業設計之能力。
Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.
schedule:
專題設計案 I
Week 1	設計主題與方向提案
Week 2	產品定位、使用者需求分析
Week 3	初步設計方案發展和設計草圖
Week 4	數位模型和詳細設計
Week 5	工程化和製造過程考量
Week 6	原型製作、使用者測試
Week 7	精模製作、設計優化
Week 8	影片拍攝、展板規劃
Week 9	共評檢討

專題設計案 II
Week 10	設計主題與方向提案
Week 11	產品定位、使用者需求分析
Week 12	初步設計方案發展和設計草圖
Week 13	數位模型和詳細設計
Week 14	材料選擇和製造過程考量
Week 15	原型製作、使用者測試
Week 16	精模製作、設計優化
Week 17	影片拍攝、展板規劃
Week 18	共評檢討

Please note that the course schedule is subject to change based on the instructor's discretion, students' progress, and specific class dynamics.
scorePolicy:
平時表現 50%
共評成績 50%
consultation: For all course-related enquiries, please contact jyk@ntut.edu.tw, thank you.
